statements.statement:
SELECT '0' chk, pm.company_cd, pm.po_no, pm.pur_dept_cd, DECODE(${lang},'kr',pd.detail_cd_nm_kr,'en',pd.detail_cd_nm_en,pd.detail_cd_nm_lo) pur_dept_nm, pm.vend_cd, lgiusf.F_GETCOMMNAME('VEND',pm.company_cd ,${lang},pm.vend_cd,'') vend_nm, pm.currency_cd, lgiusf.F_GETCOMMNAME('COMM',pm.company_cd ,${lang},'2004',pm.currency_cd) currency_nm, cu.attr1 curr_type, cu.attr2 curr_per, pm.deli_loct, DECODE(${lang},'kr',dl.detail_cd_nm_kr,'en',dl.detail_cd_nm_en,dl.detail_cd_nm_lo) deli_loct_nm, pm.pay_term, lgiusf.F_GETCOMMNAME('COMM',pm.company_cd ,${lang},'2206',pm.pay_term) pay_term_nm, pm.deli_date, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(pm.deli_date,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY/MM/DD') deliSDate, pm.email_send_date, pm.parvw, pm.pernr, pm.ekorg, pm.absgr, pm.status pstatus, lgiusf.F_GETCOMMNAME('COMM',pm.company_cd ,'en','2203',pm.status) status_nm, pm.trans_date, pm.trans_time, pm.prog_status_date, pm.prog_status_time, pm.sap_po_no, pm.sap_rtn_msg, pm.regid, pm.regdate, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(pm.regdate,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY/MM/DD') insertSDate, pm.regtime, NVL(pm.plant_cd,dd.detail_cd) plant_cd, pm.sap_if_status, pm.discount_amt, 0 minusdiscount_amt, pm.attr2 po_type, -- attr2 pm.pr_no, pm.reference_no ref_no, pm.iv_close, dl.attr1 pur_group, dl.attr2 loct_addr, pt.attr2 addr1, pt.attr3 addr2, pt.attr4 addr3, pt.attr5 addr4, pt.attr6 addr5, pt.attr7 addr6, pd.attr2 pur_dept1, pd.attr3 pur_dept2, pd.attr4 pur_dept3, pd.attr5 pur_dept4, pd.attr6 pur_dept5, pd.attr7 pur_dept6
FROM lgiusf.tb_po_master pm, lgiusf.tb_comm_cd_detail pd, lgiusf.tb_comm_cd_detail pt, lgiusf.tb_comm_cd_detail dl, ( SELECT company_cd, detail_cd FROM lgiusf.tb_comm_cd_detail WHERE company_cd = ${companyCd} AND group_cd = '2008' AND useyn ='Y' ) dd, ( SELECT ss.company_cd ,ss.detail_cd ,nvl(ss.attr1,'N') attr1 ,nvl(ss.attr2,'1') attr2 FROM lgiusf.tb_comm_cd_detail ss WHERE ss.company_cd = ${companyCd} AND ss.group_cd = '2004' AND ss.useyn ='Y' ) cu WHERE pm.company_cd = pd.company_cd AND pm.pur_dept_cd = pd.detail_cd AND pm.company_cd = ${companyCd} AND pd.group_cd = '2001'
AND pd.company_cd = pt.company_cd AND pd.company_cd = pt.detail_cd AND pt.group_cd = '2006'
AND pt.company_cd = dl.company_cd AND dl.group_cd = '2005' AND pm.deli_loct = dl.detail_cd AND dl.company_cd = dd.company_cd
AND cu.company_cd = pm.company_cd AND cu.detail_cd = pm.currency_cd
{#1} {#2} {#3} {#4} {#5} ORDER BY pm.po_no ASC
AND pm.pur_dept_cd = ${purDept}
AND pm.regdate >= REPLACE(${fromDate},'/','')
AND pm.regdate <= REPLACE(${toDate},'/','')
AND pm.vend_cd = ${vendCd}
AND pm.status = ${pstatus}

SELECT '0' chk, pd.company_cd, pd.po_no, pd.po_seq, pd.mater_cd, (SELECT DECODE(${lang},'kr',mi.mater_nm_kr, 'en',mi.mater_nm_en,mater_nm_lo) FROM tb_mater_info mi WHERE mi.company_cd = pd.company_cd AND mi.mater_cd = pd.mater_cd) mater_nm, pd.po_desc, pd.qty, pd.unit, pd.vat_cd, pd.vat_amt, lgiusf.F_GETCOMMNAME('COMM',pd.company_cd ,${lang},'2007',pd.vat_cd) vat_nm, pd.price, pd.amount, pd.tran_tax_rate, pd.tran_tax_amt, pm.currency_cd, aa.attr1 curr_Type, pd.receipt_qty, pd.receipt_cls_yn, decode(pd.receipt_qty,rd.receipt_qty,'T','F') qty_chk, sap_price FROM lgiusf.tb_po_detail pd, lgiusf.tb_po_master pm, (SELECT * FROM tb_receipt_detail rtd WHERE rtd.receipt_seq = (SELECT MAX(rdd.receipt_seq) FROM tb_receipt_detail rdd WHERE rdd.company_cd = rtd.company_cd AND rdd.po_no = rtd.po_no AND rdd.po_seq = rtd.po_seq)) rd, (SELECT ss.company_cd ,ss.detail_cd ,ss.attr1 FROM lgiusf.tb_comm_cd_detail ss WHERE company_cd = ${companyCd} AND ss.group_cd = '2004' AND ss.useyn ='Y' ) aa WHERE pm.company_cd = pd.company_cd AND pm.po_no = pd.po_no AND pm.company_cd = aa.company_cd(+) AND pm.currency_cd = aa.detail_cd(+) AND pd.company_cd = rd.company_cd(+) AND pd.po_no = rd.po_no(+) AND pd.po_seq = rd.po_seq(+) AND pd.company_cd = ${companyCd} AND pd.po_no = ${poNo} ORDER BY pd.po_seq ASC

SELECT decode(vd.main_yn,'Y','T','F') chk, vd.company_cd, vd.vend_cd, vd.vend_seq, vd.vend_person, vd.email_addr, vd.tel_no, vd.fax_no, decode(vd.main_yn,'Y','T','N','F') main_yn, decode(vd.main_yn,'Y','1','2') sort FROM lgiusf.tb_vend_master vm, lgiusf.tb_vend_detail vd WHERE vm.company_cd = vd.company_cd AND vm.company_cd = ${companyCd} AND vm.vend_cd = vd.vend_cd AND vm.useyn='Y' AND vd.useyn='Y' AND vm.vend_cd = ${vendCd} ORDER BY sort,vend_seq ASC

INSERT INTO tb_po_master( company_cd, po_no, pur_dept_cd, vend_cd, currency_cd, deli_loct, pay_term, deli_date, email_send_date, parvw, pernr, ekorg, absgr, status, trans_date, trans_time, prog_status_date, prog_status_time, sap_po_no, sap_rtn_msg, regid, regdate, regtime, pur_group, plant_cd, sap_if_status, discount_amt, pr_no, reference_no, iv_close, attr2) VALUES( ${companyCd}, ${poNo}, ${purDeptCd}, ${vendCd}, ${currencyCd}, ${deliLoct}, ${payTerm}, ${deliDate}, ${emailSendDate}, 'PE', ${userId}, ${companyCd}, ${absgr}, ${pstatus}, ${transDate}, ${transTime}, ${progStatusDate}, ${progStatusTime}, ${sapPoNo}, ${sapRtnMsg}, ${userId}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MMSS'), ${purGroup}, (SELECT detail_cd FROM lgiusf.tb_comm_cd_detail WHERE company_cd = ${companyCd} AND group_cd = '2008' AND useyn ='Y'), ${sapIfStatus}, ${discountAmt}, ${prNo}, ${refNo}, ${ivClose}, ${poType})

UPDATE tb_po_master SET pur_dept_cd = ${purDeptCd}, vend_cd = ${vendCd}, currency_cd = ${currencyCd}, deli_loct = ${deliLoct}, pay_term = ${payTerm}, deli_date = ${deliDate}, email_send_date = ${emailSendDate}, parvw = 'PE', pernr = ${pernr}, ekorg = ${companyCd}, absgr = ${absgr}, status = ${pstatus}, trans_date = ${transDate}, trans_time = ${transTime}, prog_status_date = ${progStatusDate}, prog_status_time = ${progStatusTime}, sap_po_no = ${sapPoNo}, sap_rtn_msg = ${sapRtnMsg}, modid = ${userId}, moddate = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), modtime = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MMSS'), pur_group = ${purGroup}, plant_cd = ${plantCd}, sap_if_status = ${sapIfStatus}, discount_amt = ${discountAmt}, pr_no = ${prNo}, reference_no = ${refNo}, iv_close = ${ivClose}, attr2 = ${poType} WHERE company_cd = ${companyCd} AND po_no = ${poNo}

INSERT INTO TB_PO_DETAIL( company_cd, po_no, po_seq, mater_cd, po_desc, qty, unit, vat_cd, vat_amt, price, amount, tran_tax_rate, tran_tax_amt, receipt_qty, receipt_cls_yn, regid, regdate, regtime) VALUES( ${companyCd}, ${poNo}, (SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(po_seq))+10,'10'),5,0) po_seq FROM tb_po_detail WHERE company_cd = ${companyCd} AND po_no = ${poNo}), ${materCd}, ${poDesc}, ${qty}, ${unit}, ${vatCd}, ${vatAmt}, ${price}, ${amount}, ${tranTaxRate}, ${tranTaxAmt}, 0, ${receiptClsYn}, ${userId}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MMSS'))

UPDATE tb_po_detail SET mater_cd = ${materCd}, po_desc = ${poDesc}, qty = ${qty}, unit = ${unit}, vat_cd = ${vatCd}, vat_amt = ${vatAmt}, price = ${price}, amount = ${amount}, tran_tax_rate = ${tranTaxRate}, tran_tax_amt = ${tranTaxAmt}, receipt_qty = 0, receipt_cls_yn = ${receiptClsYn}, modid = ${userId}, moddate = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), modtime = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MMSS') WHERE company_cd = ${companyCd} AND po_no = ${poNo} AND po_seq = ${poSeq}

INSERT INTO lgiusf.tb_vend_detail( company_cd, vend_cd, vend_seq, vend_person, email_addr, tel_no, fax_no, main_yn, useyn, regid, regdate, regtime) VALUES( ${companyCd}, ${vendCd}, (SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(a.vend_seq))+1,'1'),4,0) vend_seq FROM lgiusf.tb_vend_detail a WHERE a.company_cd = ${companyCd} AND a.vend_cd = ${vendCd}), ${vendPerson}, ${emailAddr}, ${telNo}, ${faxNo}, decode(${mainYn},'T','Y','Y','Y','N'), nvl(${useyn},'Y'), ${userId}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MMSS'))

UPDATE lgiusf.tb_vend_detail SET vend_person = ${vendPerson}, email_addr = ${emailAddr}, tel_no = ${telNo}, fax_no = ${faxNo}, main_yn = decode(${mainYn},'T','Y','Y','Y','N'), useyn = nvl(${useyn},'Y'), modid = ${userId}, moddate = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), modtime = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MMSS') WHERE company_cd = ${companyCd} AND vend_cd = ${vendCd} AND vend_seq = ${vendSeq}
SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(po_no))+1,TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM'))||'0001') po_no FROM tb_po_master WHERE company_cd =${companyCd} AND substr(po_no,0,6) = TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMM')

UPDATE lgiusf.tb_po_master SET sap_if_status = ${sapIfStatus}, sap_po_no = ${sapPoNo}, sap_rtn_msg = ${sapRtnMsg}, status = ${pstatus}, trans_date = ${transDate}, trans_time = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MMSS'), prog_status_date = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), prog_status_time = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MMSS') WHERE company_cd = ${companyCd} AND po_no = ${poNo}
SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') trans_date FROM DUAL

{#1} SELECT company_cd, mater_cd, decode(${lang},'kr',mater_nm_kr, 'en',mater_nm_en,mater_nm_lo) mater_nm, unit, mater_type, area_cd, div_cd, block_cd, year_cd, ha, useyn, regid, regdate FROM lgiusf.tb_mater_info WHERE useyn='Y' AND mater_type='3400' AND company_cd = ${companyCd} ORDER BY mater_nm ASC
SELECT '' AS company_cd, '' AS mater_cd, '--'||${firstVal}||'--' AS mater_nm, '' AS unit, '' AS mater_type, '' AS area_cd, '' AS div_cd, '' AS block_cd, '' AS year_cd, null AS ha, '' AS useyn, '' AS regid, '' AS regdate FROM dual UNION ALL

SELECT cd.detail_cd code, decode(${lang},'kr',cd.detail_cd_nm_kr, 'en',cd.detail_cd_nm_en, cd.detail_cd_nm_lo) name, TO_NUMBER(sort) sort FROM lgiusf.tb_comm_cd_master cm, lgiusf.tb_comm_cd_detail cd WHERE cm.company_cd = cd.company_cd AND cm.company_cd = ${companyCd} AND cm.group_cd = cd.group_cd AND cm.useyn = 'Y' AND cd.group_cd = '2007' AND cd.useyn = 'Y' AND cd.detail_cd LIKE 'V%' ORDER BY SORT

SELECT cd.detail_cd code, decode(${lang},'kr',cd.detail_cd_nm_kr, 'en',cd.detail_cd_nm_en, cd.detail_cd_nm_lo) name, cd.attr9, TO_NUMBER(sort) sort FROM lgiusf.tb_comm_cd_master cm, lgiusf.tb_comm_cd_detail cd WHERE cm.company_cd = cd.company_cd AND cm.group_cd = cd.group_cd AND cm.useyn = 'Y' AND cd.company_cd = ${companyCd} AND cd.group_cd = '2001' AND cd.useyn = 'Y' AND cd.attr9 is not null ORDER BY SORT

SELECT MAX(ra.company_cd) company_cd ,MAX(ra.po_no) po_no ,MAX(ra.tax_seq) tax_seq ,MAX(ra.wt_type) wt_type ,MAX(ra.wt_cd) wt_cd ,MAX(ra.wt_rate) wt_rate ,MAX(ra.wt_base_amt) wt_base_amt ,MAX(ra.wt_tax_amt) wt_tax_amt ,MAX(ra.attr1) attr1 ,MAX(ra.attr2) attr2 ,MAX(ra.attr3) attr3 ,MAX(ra.attr4) attr4 ,MAX(ra.attr5) attr5 ,MAX(ra.attr6) attr6 ,MAX(ra.attr7) attr7 ,MAX(ra.attr8) attr8 ,MAX(ra.attr9) attr9 ,MAX(ra.attr10) attr10 FROM (SELECT '' company_cd ,'' po_no ,'1' tax_seq ,'' wt_type ,'' wt_cd ,0 wt_rate ,0 wt_base_amt ,0 wt_tax_amt ,'' attr1 ,'' attr2 ,'' attr3 ,'' attr4 ,'' attr5 ,'' attr6 ,'' attr7 ,'' attr8 ,'' attr9 ,'' attr10 FROM dual union all SELECT pt.company_cd ,pt.po_no ,pt.tax_seq ,pt.wt_type ,pt.wt_cd ,pt.wt_rate ,pt.wt_base_amt ,pt.wt_tax_amt ,pt.attr1 ,pt.attr2 ,pt.attr3 ,pt.attr4 ,pt.attr5 ,pt.attr6 ,pt.attr7 ,pt.attr8 ,pt.attr9 ,pt.attr10 FROM tb_po_tax pt WHERE pt.company_cd = ${companyCd} AND pt.po_no = ${poNo} AND pt.tax_seq = (SELECT MAX(ptt.tax_seq) FROM tb_po_tax ptt WHERE ptt.company_cd = pt.company_cd AND ptt.po_no = pt.po_no) ) ra

SELECT cd.detail_cd code, decode(${lang},'kr',cd.detail_cd_nm_kr, 'en',cd.detail_cd_nm_en, cd.detail_cd_nm_lo) name, NVL(cd.attr1,'N') attr1, NVL(cd.attr2,'1') attr2, TO_NUMBER(sort) sort FROM lgiusf.tb_comm_cd_master cm, lgiusf.tb_comm_cd_detail cd WHERE cm.company_cd = cd.company_cd AND cm.company_cd = ${companyCd} AND cm.group_cd = cd.group_cd AND cm.useyn = 'Y' AND cd.group_cd = '2004' AND cd.useyn = 'Y'
